Method & Craft

Recently launched and built by Phil Coffman, Noah Stokes & Trent Walton. The about page explains:

We all use the same tools, but we use them differently. We strive to educate you on more efficient, creative, and engaging ways to create your design. This site will not only be valuable to creative veterans, but also educational to those new to the design field. It’s like looking over the shoulder of your favorite designer.
